message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $11,000. I think it would be of great value to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but the value of this product is truly significant. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,200. I'm really interested in the product, and I think that's a fair price for both of us.
